title: Two T206 Name on Top Miscuts - FINAL PRICE DROP - 1/28
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Two T206 Name on Top Miscuts - FINAL PRICE DROP - 1/28
posts.post_content:
Well, I've enjoyed these cards, but it's time for them to find a new home.  My tastes have changed a bit and I have slightly different criteria for this sub-collection, and these don't fit the bill anymore.  

Prices include delivery; PayPal preferred.  Take the remaining two for $70...

AVAILABLE
$50 - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100120/hartsel/web.jpg"]Topsy Hartsel SGC 10[/URL] - This one has factory number on top on back as well
$25 - [URL="http://gallery.me.com/kimsummers/100120/williams/web.jpg"]Jimmy Williams SGC 10[/URL] - creasing

[quote name="mrvster" post=958753]Good luck Erick...

Sweet cards:D[/QUOTE]

Johnny, you should be all over that Hartsel - I can't remember the last time I saw one like that.

Scott!!

we think totally alike!!you are so right....those miscut fact are super tuf...

i have one with the back fact at top.....but was thinking about this one.:).....


Keep your eyes peeled....btw....good luck with your auctions scott:D

Erick!

if hartsel isn't moving....maybe i'll think about that one...;)
I'm thinking Hartsel might end up at Sterling next month...

[quote name="t206hound" post=958881]I'm thinking Hartsel might end up at Sterling next month...[/QUOTE]

By the way - your T206 Brown is in the mail.  Eight years I would have bought all of these without thinking twice, but trying to show restraint and leave something for the new generation of 'scrap' collector.

PM sent on the Stone.

Thanks,
Dan
